response.overview: Baki Hanma, a teenager who trains relentlessly to surpass his father, Yujiro Hanma, the strongest and most violent fighter in the world. The series focuses on underground combat, extreme physical feats, and brutal one-on-one battles, featuring fighters from various disciplines and backgrounds. Strength, survival, and the meaning of power are recurring themes throughout the story.
response.tagline: “The ultimate fight to become the strongest on Earth.”
response.title: Baki
